tag_list: huddle, bhava, marketing, public-relations, pr, branding
overview:
A published poet and Michigan native, Aaron Endré left the Midwest in 2008 to join the flourishing tech industry in San Francisco. As the first hire at Bhava Communications, he helped build the scrappy PR agency from two people to more than a dozen and advised disruptive data infrastructure companies on marketing, PR and brand identity—from disruptive startups like Pure Storage, Data Robotics and Cloudera to international public enterprises like Overland Storage and IBM.

In 2012 he left agency life to join Huddle, leading communications in the United States.

degrees.subject: Economics and Business; International Trade and Commerce
